description: The raw output from the ATAC-seq and RNA-seq pipelines combined into a MuData object, readable with the muon package
The processed data for each modality with the combined analysis as a MuData object, readable with the muon package

UMAP plot of cells for combined modalities after multifactor analysis, colored by Leiden cluster ID

Quality control results from Scanpy, per-cell and per-gene, in HDF5 format
Quality control report from salmon-rnaseq pipeline in JSON format
